stories.body:
Do you know why the scarecrow won an award?
 He was outstanding in his field!
stories.author: Xerxes II

stories.body:
What does a dog and a cellphone have in common?
 Both have Collar ID
stories.author: Charlemagne

stories.body:
What's a dog's favorite instrument?
 A Trom-bone!
stories.author: Henry VIII

stories.body:
What concert costs just 45 cents?
 50 Cent featuring Nickelback!
stories.author: Ivan the Terrible
